nodes.text: Block 1138 Sable was the room block located in the center of the Black Level—the lowest of the three passenger levels on the Errant Venture, located just above the Mines. The block was occupied by the ship's security force and was much nicer than the rest of the Black Level, which was mostly holds, workshops and stripped passenger cabins.
Block 1138 Sable is one of many references throughout Star Wars media to George Lucas' first feature film, THX 1138.
